text:
#loveLancaster 🌹❤ 
Surreal times, dressing up for the clinic (a favourite dress & a faux fur wrap, I was not the only one!) 🤷‍♀️  in 2021 this is an afternoon out!🧤🧣👗
But delighted to have received the #COVID19 #vaccine 
🤗
